column1: 31,236,11,474,11,474,52,236,52,BROWN & WILLIAMSON TOBACCO CORPORATION MATERIAL SPECIFICATION DESIGN CHANGE AUTHORIZATION,header
46,17,256,248,256,248,269,17,269,If a material or dimensional change also involved?,header

62,115,630,674,630,674,711,115,711,Material # 50 -034 A has been assigned to the VICEROY Rich Lights 100' s 20' s Label with new bottom panel. Bottom now incorporates shield. On both side and bottom panels, "VICEROY" and "Rich Lights" have been inverted. Cartons and labels must change design simultaneously. The current design cannot be used in production after 10/ 30/ 81.,answer
